message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12,000.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the product, but I'm only able to pay up to $9,500 for it. Looking forward to your response.

Hi Bob, thank you for your counteroffer. I understand you're looking to save some money, but I'm not willing to go as low as $9,500. I'm willing to meet you halfway, though. I'm now offering the product to you for $11,000.
Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I appreciate your flexibility. I'm still looking to stay within my budget. Would you consider $10,500?

Hi Bob, I understand you're still trying to save some money, but I'm not willing to go as low as $10,500. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make a profit. I'm now offering the product to you for $11,500.
Hello Alice, thank you for your latest offer. I understand your position, but I'm still committed to staying within my budget. Could you consider $11,000?

Hi Bob, I see you're still trying to negotiate. I'm willing to meet you at $11,000, but I'm not going to go any lower. However, I'm willing to throw in some extras to sweeten the deal. I'll include a one-year warranty and a free maintenance package. The price remains at $11,000.
Hello Alice, thank you for the additional incentives. I appreciate the warranty and maintenance package, but I'm still looking to keep the cost at $10,500.

Hi Bob, I'm starting to think we're getting close to a deal. I'm willing to meet you at $10,750, but I'm not going to go any lower than that. I'll throw in an additional year of warranty on top of the one I already offered, and I'll also include a free setup service. The price remains at $10,750.
Hello Alice, thank you for considering my needs. I appreciate the additional incentives, but I'm still committed to staying within my budget. Could you possibly meet me at $10,500?
